title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize Apple platform development with AWS and EC2 Mac (CMP334)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 和 EC2 Mac 现代化 Apple 平台开发 (CMP334)
abstract: EC2 Mac instances allow you to run on-demand macOS workloads in the cloud and extend the flexibility, scalability, and cost benefits of AWS to all Apple developers. In this session, you will learn about Apple application development in the cloud using EC2 Mac instances. We will share the latest features and advancements for EC2 Mac and how customers are benefiting from them. You will also hear firsthand from a customer on how they have optmized their Apple development worklfow and benefited from Apple application development in the cloud.
abstract_cn: EC2 Mac 实例允许您在云中运行按需 macOS 工作负载，并将 AWS 的灵活性、可扩展性和成本效益扩展到所有 Apple 开发者。在本次会议中，您将了解如何使用 EC2 Mac 实例在云中进行 Apple 应用程序开发。我们将分享 EC2 Mac 的最新功能和进展，以及客户如何从中受益。您还将直接听取客户分享他们如何优化 Apple 开发工作流程并从云中的 Apple 应用程序开发中获益。

presenter.name: Vishal Mummigatti
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical - External Services
